post.body: Depends on how much you plan on using the samples and how much audio you'll record. I've been fine with 2.5gigs on my G5 though.
BTW, it's a *star*caster, not a *strato*caster. I didn't realize that until a couple hours after I hit "check out". Probably okâ€¦
dehydration. Maybe you need to eat more veggies too. Just sayin'. On the dark/bright side, maybe you actually do have an illnes
Not to sound like a health nut, but there's no reason your body should feel *sick* just because. Headaches can be a symptom of
Is that the guitar he uses?
That said, I'll likely upgrade to iTunes Plus shortly. $13 for a few albums and a bunch of tracks I don't think I have anymore.
BTW - I don't really know if that's what went down, but you've got to think that's part of the benefit, right? Not so altruistic now, is it?
Apple to shareholders: iTunes Plus files are twice as big, so more iPod sales. Apple to users: The *sound*! It's like Jaysus singing! OOOHH!
Watching The Doors movie. Turns out that I don't really like The Doors. Wait, wtf *- that Duck dude from Mad Men owns Elektra records?
How can you stay with a fat girl who says oh would you like to marry me and if you like you can buy the ring she doesn't care about anything
Tried Bowtie & Coverstream for itunes, but Coversutra is closer to perfect. Just needs "Play Next In Party Shuffle" + search to work better
I bought everything i need to start rocking: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0019421EY
Pineapple Express comes out on Tuesday. is it me or do movies come out a lot sooner than they used to?
i made a video about how to make a 'favorites' folder for software synths in Logic Pro 8 - http://www.vimeo.com/2674129
I bought those Samuel Adams beer glasses for my dad. I don't know if they make the beer taste better, but it does make it more fun to drink.
Listening to Veruca Salt - American Thighs brings me back to junior high, but in a good way.
Trying out eventbox - puts all your social networks in one place. Is Nice! http://thecosmicmachine.com/
I decided I can't live any longer without watching Caddyshack. So - watching caddyshack.
Nothing says Made In China quite like when bullet pointed features include "Expertize Design" and "Best in Quality"
Back into GTA 4 - finished that one mission I couldn't figure out. Driving still mostly sucks.
